pages.text: $(li)The Mineshaft is a structure that can be found deeper of the caves or $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They can be found over the Nether and the End too.$(br)$(li)They are mainly composed of a old interconnection of $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/rail)Rails$(/l), $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/minecart)Minecarts$(/l) and even $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/chest_minecart)Minecart with Chests$(/l) that works as $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l).
